18 import rospy
19 from collections import OrderedDict, namedtuple
20 
21 from std_msgs.msg import Bool
22 
23 # Utils
24 from niryo_robot_utils import debounce
25 
26 # Command Status
27 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
28 from niryo_robot_rpi.msg import I2CComponent
29 
30 # Service
31 from niryo_robot_rpi.srv import ScanI2CBus, ScanI2CBusResponse
32 
33 # Libraries
34 from ..common.abstract_io_panel import AbstractIOPanel
35 from ..common.end_effector_panel import NiryoEndEffectorPanel
36 from ..common.gpio_expander_adapters import GpioManager
37 from ..common.rpi_ros_utils import ping_i2c
38 
39 from .hardware.MAX11644 import MAX11644
40 from .mcp_io_objects import AnalogInput, AnalogOutput, McpIOManager
41 
42 I2CObject = namedtuple("I2CObject", ['info', 'bus', 'address'])
43 
44 
45 class IOPanel(AbstractIOPanel):
46 
47  def __init__(
48  self,
49  mcp_manager=None,
50  adc=None,
51  ):
52  super(IOPanel, self).__init__()
53 
54  self.__mcp_manager = mcp_manager if mcp_manager is not None else McpIOManager()
55 
56  adc_param = rospy.get_param("~adc")
57  self.__adc = adc if adc is not None else MAX11644(
58  bus=adc_param["i2c_bus"], address=adc_param["address"], v_ref_internal=adc_param["v_ref"])
59  self.__end_effector_panel = NiryoEndEffectorPanel(self._callback_digital_io_change)
60  self.__init_ios()
61 
62  self._publish_digital_io_state()
63 
64  self.__mcp_manager.register_on_change_callback(self._callback_digital_io_change, "io panel callback")
65 
66  self.__sound_card_i2C = I2CObject(info='Sound Card',
67  address=rospy.get_param('~sound_card/i2c_address'),
68  bus=rospy.get_param('~sound_card/i2c_bus'))
69  rospy.Service("~scan_i2c_bus", ScanI2CBus, self.__callback_scan_i2c_bus)
70 
71  # This pin is only available for the ned3pro
72  if rospy.has_param('~monitor_12v_pin'):
73  self.__gpio_manager = GpioManager()
74  self.__estop_status_pub = rospy.Publisher('/niryo_robot_rpi/estop_status', Bool, queue_size=10)
75  self.__monitor_12v = self.__gpio_manager.add_input(rospy.get_param('~monitor_12v_pin'), 'monitor 12v')
76  self.__monitor_12v.on_change(self.__on_estop_change_callback)
77 
78  def shutdown(self):
79  super(IOPanel, self).shutdown()
80 
81  def __init_ios(self):
82  self._digital_outputs = OrderedDict([(digital_output["name"],
83  self.__mcp_manager.add_output(digital_output["pin"],
84  digital_output["name"],
85  reversed=digital_output["reverse"]))
86  for digital_output in rospy.get_param("~digital_outputs")])
87 
88  self._digital_inputs = OrderedDict([(digital_input["name"],
89  self.__mcp_manager.add_input(digital_input["pin"],
90  digital_input["name"],
91  digital_input["reverse"]))
92  for digital_input in rospy.get_param("~digital_inputs")])
93 
94  self._digital_outputs[self.__end_effector_panel.digital_output.name] = self.__end_effector_panel.digital_output
95  self._digital_inputs[self.__end_effector_panel.digital_input.name] = self.__end_effector_panel.digital_input
96 
97  self._digital_outputs = OrderedDict(sorted(self._digital_outputs.items()))
98  self._digital_inputs = OrderedDict(sorted(self._digital_inputs.items()))
99 
100  self._analog_outputs = OrderedDict([(analog_output["name"],
101  AnalogOutput(self.__mcp_manager.lock,
102  analog_output["pin"],
103  analog_output["name"],
104  analog_output["address"],
105  analog_output["i2c_bus"],
106  analog_output["v_ref"],
107  analog_output["resolution"]))
108  for analog_output in rospy.get_param("~analog_outputs")])
109 
110  self._analog_inputs = OrderedDict([(analog_input["name"],
111  AnalogInput(self.__adc,
112  self.__mcp_manager.lock,
113  analog_input["pin"],
114  analog_input["name"],
115  analog_input["dividing_bridge_factor"]))
116  for analog_input in rospy.get_param("~analog_inputs")])
117 
118  def _callback_digital_io_change(self):
119  self._publish_digital_io_state()
120 
121  def _callback_set_analog_io(self, req):
122  if req.name in self._analog_outputs:
123  self._analog_outputs[req.name].value = req.value
124  elif req.name in self._analog_inputs:
125  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR,
126  "You cannot set a state of an analog input outside the simulation mode")
127  elif req.name in self._digital_inputs or req.name in self._digital_outputs:
128  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR,
129  "{} is not an analog IO, but a digital IO".format(req.name))
130  else:
131  # No pin found
132  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.DIGITAL_IO_PANEL_ERROR, "No IO found for {}".format(req.name))
133  self._publish_analog_io_state()
134  return self._create_response(CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Successfully set value for {}".format(req.name))
135 
136  def __callback_scan_i2c_bus(self, _req):
137  resp = ScanI2CBusResponse()
138 
139  for i2c_object in [self.__mcp_manager.mcp, self.__adc, self.__sound_card_i2C] + list(
140  self._analog_outputs.values()):
141  i2C_component = I2CComponent(info=str(i2c_object), bus=int(i2c_object.bus), address=int(i2c_object.address))
142  if ping_i2c(i2c_object.bus, i2c_object.address):
143  resp.detected.append(i2C_component)
144  else:
145  resp.missing.append(i2C_component)
146  rospy.logwarn('Missing ic2 component: bus {}, address {}'.format(int(i2c_object.bus),
147  int(i2c_object.address)))
148  resp.is_ok = not resp.missing
149 
150  if resp.is_ok:
151  resp.status = CommandStatus.SUCCESS
152  resp.message = "I2C scan succeed"
153  else:
154  resp.is_ok = CommandStatus.MISSING_I2C
155  resp.message = "I2C scan failed"
156 
157  return resp
158 
159  @debounce(2.0, lambda self, value: value != 1)
160  def __on_estop_change_callback(self, value):
161  msg = Bool(value == 1)
162  self.__estop_status_pub.publish(msg)
